name: Logical Path
description:
Welcome to Logical Path

This game will let you to check your knowledge about binary logic and logical gates.
Don't worry if you don't know anything about it. It's the education game and we will start from basics. We will unlock new gates and components step by step and finally we'll create working simple CPU.
This project is in development and current version contains only editor. 
I hope you'll like it.

If you like logical puzzles, "redstone" from "Minecraft", or you want to know how CPU works, join to us.

Planned Features:
  • Multiplayer
  • Interactive lessons
  • Infinity world
  • All basic logic gates + various new components
  • Comfortable tools for editing schemes
  • Custom color themes
Follow us and get news and updates!
